text: Iti: “Munoona here kana iri (Qur’aan) richibva kuna Allah uye imi moriramba, uye mupupuri kubva kuvana vaIzirairi (Abdullah bin Salaam (RA)) vopupura kuti (iri Qur’aan riri kubva kuna Allah) se(Torah), uye otenda (opinda Islaam) apo imi muchizvitutumadza (musingatendi).” Zvirokwazvo, Allah havatungamiriri vanhu vanotadza
